name: Nick Solana
text: no, i am not. i don't need to gothat route.. i'm not saying international or local media outlets, HR organizations international or local are above being manipulated.. but i'm saying it is more likely somebody wanted Digong discredited and threw a bone to all "stakeholders" and  watched the outcome, maybe with a few more bones here and there. but this speculation does not matter.. whatever came out has  remained mere allegations from ANY stakeholder.    Now, if one is concerned about due process, the law, or human rights, clearly one must ignore all these until something more substantial comes around.    i'd like to share one of my status here in an attempt to have a more constructive and hopefully more positive conversation...    "Been reading about desires, mostly from Digong supporters- admittedly there are very few non Digong supporters in my circle, about selling the positives of candidates and minimize the negative highlights.     Challenge accepted, here's my opening salvo:  1.Davao, supposedly - maybe may bagong dev't na sa Ibang lugar-, is the only place in the world with a FREE 911 service. And it's response time in my experience is under 10min. I usually report neighbors who do loud videoke past 10pm.    Yan na lang muna. Ano ang pde Itapat jan ng kandidato mo?    😁 "
